solution_criteria: Provides complete daily caloric intake matching athlete's metabolic needs
Ensures balanced macronutrient distribution for endurance performance
Includes strategic meal timing for training nutrition
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Test scenario: Design a high-intensity endurance athlete's meal plan with extreme caloric and macro-nutrient constraints, focusing on ultra-marathon or triathlon training nutrition requirements
